ComicInfo.Summary: Return to Planet Hulk Part II: Hulk wins the first round of the Gauntlet. The Warlord sends Lickspit to investigate the portal and find someone from Earth who will be powerful enough to defeat the Hulk. Sharn, an elder Shadow Priestess visits Clan Doka'abi and gives them fuel cells for their blaster weapon. The Warlord retaliates by strapping Sharn and her sons to a Wildebot in the second round of the Gauntlet.
ComicInfo.Tags: Lickspit,Maeera,Chak,Return To Planet Hulk,Amadeus Cho,Headman Bahng,Warlord,Sakaar
ComicInfo.Title: Return to Planet Hulk Part II
ComicInfo.CoverArtist: Dick Ayers,Frank D'Armata,Greg Land,Jack Kirby,Jay Leisten,Paul Mounts
